trans-unit.source: ms.ContentId: C2593EA1-B182-4C71-8504-49691F619158 title: Step 1: Make sure your machine is compatible
trans-unit.target: ms.ContentId: C2593EA1-B182-4C71-8504-49691F619158 title: Step 1: Make sure your machine is compatible

trans-unit.source: Operating System Compatibility
trans-unit.target: Operating System Compatibility

trans-unit.source: 30-Nov update.
trans-unit.target: 30-Nov update.

trans-unit.source: The Hyper-V role can only be installed on the Pro, Enterprise and Education editions of Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: The Hyper-V role can only be installed on the Pro, Enterprise and Education editions of Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: If you are using the Home, Mobile or Mobile Enterprise edition of Windows 10, the Hyper-V role cannot be used.
trans-unit.target: If you are using the Home, Mobile or Mobile Enterprise edition of Windows 10, the Hyper-V role cannot be used.

trans-unit.source: Windows 10 Home edition can be upgraded to Windows 10 Professional.
trans-unit.target: Windows 10 Home edition can be upgraded to Windows 10 Professional.

trans-unit.source: To do so open up settings > Update and Security > Activation.
trans-unit.target: To do so open up settings > Update and Security > Activation.

trans-unit.source: Here you can visit the store and purchase an upgrade.
trans-unit.target: Here you can visit the store and purchase an upgrade.

trans-unit.source: Hardware Compatibility
trans-unit.target: Hardware Compatibility

trans-unit.source: While this document will not provide a complete list of Hyper-V compatible hardware the following items are necessary:
trans-unit.target: While this document will not provide a complete list of Hyper-V compatible hardware the following items are necessary:

trans-unit.source: 64-bit Processor with Second Level Address Translation (SLAT).
trans-unit.target: 64-bit Processor with Second Level Address Translation (SLAT).

trans-unit.source: VM Monitor Mode Extension must be present.
trans-unit.target: VM Monitor Mode Extension must be present.

trans-unit.source: Minimum of 4 GB memory, however because virtual machines will share this memory with the Hyper-V host, you will want to provide enough memory to handle the expected virtual workload.
trans-unit.target: Minimum of 4 GB memory, however because virtual machines will share this memory with the Hyper-V host, you will want to provide enough memory to handle the expected virtual workload.

trans-unit.source: The following items will need to be enabled in the system bios:
trans-unit.target: The following items will need to be enabled in the system bios:

trans-unit.source: Virtualization
trans-unit.target: Virtualization

trans-unit.source: Data Execution Prevention
trans-unit.target: Data Execution Prevention

trans-unit.source: Verify Hardware Compatibility
trans-unit.target: Verify Hardware Compatibility

trans-unit.source: To verify compatibly, open up PowerShell or a command prompt (cmd.exe) and type `systeminfo.exe`.
trans-unit.target: To verify compatibly, open up PowerShell or a command prompt (cmd.exe) and type `systeminfo.exe`.

trans-unit.source: This will return information about Hyper-V compatibility.
trans-unit.target: This will return information about Hyper-V compatibility.

trans-unit.source: If all listed item have a value of ‘Yes’ your system can run the Hyper-V role.
trans-unit.target: If all listed item have a value of ‘Yes’ your system can run the Hyper-V role.

trans-unit.source: If any item returns ‘No’, check the requirements listed in this document and make adjustments where possible.
trans-unit.target: If any item returns ‘No’, check the requirements listed in this document and make adjustments where possible.

trans-unit.source: Existing Hyper-V Host
trans-unit.target: Existing Hyper-V Host

trans-unit.source: If you run systeminfo.exe on an existing Hyper-V host, the Hyper-V Requirements section will read:
trans-unit.target: If you run systeminfo.exe on an existing Hyper-V host, the Hyper-V Requirements section will read:

trans-unit.source: Next Step:
trans-unit.target: Next Step:

trans-unit.source: Step 2: Install Hyper-V
trans-unit.target: Step 2: Install Hyper-V
